name: Grapple Golf
description:
Play as Putter Parker in this momentum-based 2D puzzle game!! Solve each level in this charming game so that you can be together with your golf-ball partner.

This game was created in 12 hours for the United Game Jam 2020. I incorporated the theme of two by making a 2D puzzle game. The goal of the game is to eventually reach the game character's partner so that the couple will be reunited. Another way I incorporated the theme was through the game's color scheme. 

I honestly am a complete beginner when it comes to GameDev. This not only my first Game Jam, but my first finished game. Any feedback will be much appreciated!

ASSETS USED:

  • Art - Drawn during the Game Jam by discord user ell.bell.tea#9195
  • Music - Theme by Chopy61#4413
  • Sound Effects:
    • https://opengameart.org/content/completion-sound
    • https://opengameart.org/content/bow-arrow-shot
    • https://opengameart.org/content/punch-slap-n-kick
